system.sustained:
The Character allows themselves to be possessed by a lesser Daemon, that they are capable of some control over. WHilst sustained character gains Daemonic (X) and Unnatural Strength (X) where X = Psy Rating / 2, as well as Deadly Natural Weapons Trait. They must also make a +0 Willpower Test each round or enter a Frenzied state, whilst frenzied the power must continue to be sustained (bypassing psychic power rule of Frenzy). If psychic Phenomena occurs from this power, a more powerful Daemon enters the psyker, and the character must succeed an Opposed Willpower Test or actually become possessed.
If power is Successfully manifested, gain Corruption Points equal to the Psy Rating used to manifest this power after its effects have been resolved.
